children.description: Anything that can be rendered as form field group content. (React component or element)

className.description: Additional classes added to the form field group.

isExpandable.description: Flag indicating if the field group is expandable

isExpanded.description: Flag indicate if the form field group is expanded. Modifies the card to be expandable.

onToggle.description: Function callback called when user clicks toggle button (Function: () => void)

toggleAriaLabel.description: Aria-label to use on the form field group toggle button
